<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Elizabeth's father, John, provides her with love and guidance.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:John a :Person ;
    :name "John";
    :sex :Male ;
    :child :Elizabeth .

:Elizabeth a :Person ;
    :name "Elizabeth";
    :sex :Female ;
    :father :John .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. John always made sure his girl, Erin, went to bed on time, since a good nights sleep is important.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

    :name "John";

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. John decided that his daughter was old enough to learn to drive, who better to teach Elizabeth than himself.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

    :name "John";

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. John always cooked dinner on Thursday's for Elizabeth. That was his way of catching up with his daughter regularly.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Erin thought John was overreacting about her date, but he was her father after all.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. While John approved of Mary's latest boyfriend, he did question his daughter's taste sometimes.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. John was amazed at Mary's decorating skills.  He knew his daughter was talented but hadn't realized just how much so.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Sometimes Mary wanted John to know that she appreciated his fatherly advice, even when it was unsolicited.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .
